planing

basically is doing

station then several security related

related

interoperability
issues so here comes up our research
question is it possible to develop an
automated framework to identify those
security policy violations in 5G
implementations to achieve this goal we
designed our tool 5G based Checker the
key intuition is differential testing
since those 5G devices are implementing
the same protocol if two devices
behaving differently for the same input
then at least one device is
non-compliant with the specifications or
this is a case that under specified in
the
specification building on this intuition
5G based tracker apply differential
testing on multiple 5G devices to
identify Dev
behaviors after that we use those DN
behaviors as a proxy for identifying
potential security violation in those 5G
devices since we are doing differential
testing one question would naturally
arise here how to generate the input
generating random inputs will not work
because 5G control plan protocol is
actually stateful and also we are doing
over the air testing this is is a bit
slow and if we Generate random inputs it
will take a lot of time so we need a
smarter way to generate the input
sequence instead of randomly generating
them we decided to utilize automat
learning technique to synthesize finite
State machine to model each devices
behavior and then identify the
differences between those constructed
finite s
machines okay next I will introduce how
our tool 5G based tracker works so we
have three components the state synth da
scan and dazer I will introduce these
three components
sequentially okay uh now let's move to
the first component of our tool it is
called State syn the input for this

Collaborative Learning technique which

machine learning efficiency we can bring

sequentially until we construct finite
St machines for all the

reduce the problem to a model checking

whether two finite State machines are
giving different
output to capture all unique deviations
we also introduced the graph traversal

we absolutely need some other techniques

we designed the third component we call

unresolved the DI lizer first picks an

the security expert for manual analysis
the security expert then searched the 5G
specification to identify the correct
behavior for this input sequence and
write one or more LTL property then
return those properties to back to the
devizer based on those LTL properties
the daizer can automatically charge a
set of
deviations and the security expert will
